title: Is Rocksteady Making a Suicide Squad Game? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.22.20
description:
Blessing and Fran tackle a HUGE news day and talk about a rumored Suicide Squad game coming from Rocksteady. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
It’s been a busy morning! We’ve had a few live reactions that are now available on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
Tim and I reacted to the Smash Presentation featuring a new Arms character.
Tim, Barrett, and IGN’s Jonathon Dornbush reacted to that new trailer for Crash 4.
Greg and Andy reacted to today’s Day of The Dev’s stream. 
AND Barrett’s First Impressions of Spongebob Squarepants: Battle for Bikini Bottom JUST went live
We’re reacting live TOMORROW to the Summer Game Fest stream. That’s at 8am with Greg, Tim, and Blessing!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mohammed Mohammed
Conner Nolan
Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:02 - Rocksteady is apparently making a Suicide Squad game
00:14:04 - Spongebob Squarepants Battle For Bikini Bottom Rehydrated review roundup
00:26:17 - Nintendo is slowing down on mobile games
00:35:32 - Former Microsoft employee accuses Mixer manager of racist comments - https://www.twitlonger.com/show/n_1sr9idp 
00:45:45 - Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time has been Officially Announced
00:47:50 - Min Min is coming to Smash Ultimate
00:49:50 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:55:52 - “With the delay of Cyberpunk to November 19th, we now have Cyberpunk in the Jedi Fallen Order release date taking it out of contention for the game awards event…” - Julian - The Gluten Free Gamer
01:01:49 - “What if Nintendo is working on “Mario Kart Ultimate” and is going to release a Mario Kart game with every track ever in a Mario Kart game remastered for the Switch?” - Aidan Dean
01:04:02 - You‘re Wrong
01:06:57 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Tim
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
